sentences.english: Firstly, it discusses the formation background of Civil Right Thought of Reform Clique.

sentences.english: The second part analyzed the movement of anti-foot-binding launched by Wuxu Reformists from the aspects of thoughts and observations.
sentences.chinese: 从思想言论方面对戊戌维新派的不缠足进行阐述。
